002.text: The monsters are mindless. They only follow their leaders orders.

003.text: OK. Safe Travels and Good Luck

004.text: I've heard the leader lives in a house in the darkest part of the forest. No man ever makes it back alive

005.text: Don't tell me, are you planning on fighting that beast?

006.text: You look strong, but that sword is weak. It will shatter soon. Bring me 500 stars and I'll strengthen your sword

007.text: Do you want to upgrade your sword?

008.text: Here you go, now atleast you have a chance against the monster
